EnumerationLxN.Name: CameraName
EnumerationLxN.Description: Connected Cameras in Current LAN, including GIGE Area Scan and Line Scan Camera, or USB Connected U3V Camera

Integer.Name: ReconnectTime
Integer.Description: The Duration of attempting to reconnect for a disconnected Camera(unit:s)

Integer.Name: SoftTriggerWaitTime
Integer.Description: The Duration of waitting for soft trigger time(unit:s)

EnumerationBx.Name: TriggerSelector
EnumerationBx.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumerationBx.Name: ExposureAuto
EnumerationBx.Description: Represent Exposure Mode, including Continuous Mode, Once Mode and Off Mode

EnumerationBx.Name: GainAuto
EnumerationBx.Description: Represent Gain Mode, including Continuous Mode, Once Mode and Off Mode

FloatBx.Name: AutoGainLowerLimit
FloatBx.Description: Min Gain Value in Auto Gain Mode

FloatBx.Name: AutoGainUpperLimit
FloatBx.Description: Max Gain Value in Auto Gain Mode

FloatBx.Name: AutoGainRawLowerLimit
FloatBx.Description: Min Gain Value in Auto Gain Mode

FloatBx.Name: AutoGainRawUpperLimit
FloatBx.Description: Max Gain Value in Auto Gain Mode

IntegerBx.Name: AcquisitionLineRate
IntegerBx.Description: Line rate setting opened (line scan camera parameter)

StringBx.Name: ResultingLineRate
StringBx.Description: Line rate opened (line scan camera parameter)

Enumeration.Name: IOEnableElectricalLevel
Enumeration.Description: IO Actvie Level, Active-High or Active-Low

BooleanBx.Name: LineInverter
BooleanBx.Description: 反相输出,控制高低电平的输出

IntegerBx.Name: Strobe0Delay
IntegerBx.Description: 当触发条件到来后，设置延迟多久输出(设置前需启用对应输出源,仅对Line 0输出有效,单位微秒)

IntegerBx.Name: Strobe1Delay
IntegerBx.Description: 当触发条件到来后，设置延迟多久输出(设置前需启用对应输出源,仅对Line 1输出有效,单位微秒)

IntegerBx.Name: Strobe2Delay
IntegerBx.Description: 当触发条件到来后，设置延迟多久输出(设置前需启用对应输出源,仅对Line 2输出有效,单位微秒)

IntegerBx.Name: Strobe0PulseWidth
IntegerBx.Description: 当触发条件到来后，设置输出持续时间(设置前需启用对应输出源,仅对Line 0输出有效,单位微秒)

IntegerBx.Name: Strobe1PulseWidth
IntegerBx.Description: 当触发条件到来后，设置输出持续时间(设置前需启用对应输出源,仅对Line 1输出有效,单位微秒)

IntegerBx.Name: Strobe2PulseWidth
IntegerBx.Description: 当触发条件到来后，设置输出持续时间(设置前需启用对应输出源,仅对Line 2输出有效,单位微秒)
